publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2525.2 Margaret Smith: SNP Government Failure on Jobs for Newly-Qualified Teachers—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2525) in the name of Rhona Brankin, after "class sizes are rising," insert "highlighting that the SNP’s manifesto commitment to reduce class sizes to 18 in P1 to P3 is in utter chaos, with insufficient funding, a lack of a legal framework and the omission of the policy from 21 out of 32 local authorities’ single outcome agreements,".
